description: Creamy baked honey mustard chicken. Easy recipe to make.
name: Quick Honey Mustard Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: sprig a few rosemary or parsley

recipeInstructions.text: Coat baking tray with oil. Preheat oven to 180 degrees. Arrange chicken drumsticks in tray and sprinkle garlic powder.
Mix Dijon mustard, honey and chicken stock in bowl. Pour over chicken. Add rosemary or parsley. Cover tray with foil. Put in oven.
After 30 minutes in oven, remove foil and turn chicken drumsticks over. Put back into oven for a further 20-30 minutes (or till browned & juice running).

Remove tray from oven. Set aside chicken and pour gravy in small pot. Mix up cornflour and water and add it to sauce. Stir in low heat till sauce thickens. Adjust sauce with salt and pepper. Serve with chicken drumsticks with sauce and garnish with chopped parsley.
